{"id":950046065,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1684044662,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"18 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/950046065/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int m = word1.size();\n        int n = word2.size();\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(m+1, vector<int> (n+1, 0));\n\n        for (int i = 0; i <= m; ++i) {\n            for (int j = 0; j <= n; ++j) {\n                if (i == 0) dp[i][j] = j;\n                else if (j == 0) dp[i][j] = i;\n                else {\n                    if (word1[i-1] == word2[j-1]) {\n                        dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1];\n                    } else {\n                        dp[i][j] = 1 + min(dp[i-1][j], min(dp[i-1][j-1], dp[i][j-1]));\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[m][n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false}
